2.description: Befriend coop animals quicker. Incubation time (for Incubator and Ostrich Incubator) cut in half.

3.description: Befriend barn animals quicker. Sheep produce wool faster.

4.description: Artisan goods (wine, cheese, oil, etc.) worth 40% more.

7.description: Chance for gems to appear in pairs. (50% chance per mining node. Also applies to geodes spawned from breaking rocks.)

8.description: Metal bars worth 50% more. (Applies to Copper, Iron, Gold, Iridium, & Radioactive Bars)

10.description: Chance to find geodes doubled. (Applies to all 4 types of geodes)

11.description: Gems worth 30% more. (applies to Minerals and Gems)

12.description: Trees drop 25% more wood. (Applies to Trees, Stumps & Logs)

13.description: Chance for double harvest of foraged items. (20% chance of double harvest)

14.description: All trees have a chance to drop hardwood.

16.description: Foraged items are always highest quality.

19.description: Resources required to craft crab pots reduced.

22.description: Crab pots no longer produce junk items.

23.description: Crab pots no longer require bait.

28.description: Cooldown on special moves cut in half.
